extends java.lang.Object

      Grid()
      constructor that creates an empty grid

      increments the number of ships sunk variable if a new ship is sunk and if shipsSunk = 8 then game is over and asks user what they want to do

      void updateShipGrid(Ship[] ships, int i)

      • displayShips

        public void displayShips()

      • placeShips

        public Ship[] placeShips()
        Creates ships, displays information about the ships and checks if it is a valid position
        Returns:
        ships array of all ship objects

      • updateShipGrid

        public void updateShipGrid(Ship[] ships,
                           int i)
        This method goes through every position on the ship and checks if it is out of bounds and calls a method to check if it is overlapping other ships
        Parameters:
        ships - array of all ship objects
        i - current ship being checked

      • clearOverlappedShip2

        public void clearOverlappedShip2(Ship[] ships,
                                 int lastShipNo)
        Resets overlapped ships grid to previous ship code
        Parameters:
        ships - array of ship objects
        lastShipNo - number of ships already placed

      • createShips

        public Ship createShips(Ship[] ships,
                        int i)
        Used to create an array of ship objects by calling constructor from Ship class
        Parameters:
        ships - array of ship objects
        i - index which determines current ship being checked
        Returns:
        ships[i] indexed object in ships class

      • attackCell

        public boolean attackCell(int x,
                          int y,
                          Ship[] ships,
                          Player mySelf,
                          Grid myGrid)
        Checks whether target position is valid or not and calls method which determines if a ship was hit or not
        Parameters:
        x - target position, x coordinate
        y - target position, y coordinate
        ships - array of ship objects
        mySelf - object for user
        myGrid - object used to call methods in grid class
        Returns:
        boolean value whether ship is hit or not

                                Ship[] ships)
        Checks whether target position is valid or not and calls method which determines if a ship was hit or not
        Parameters:

        y - target position, y coordinate
        ships - array of ship objects
        Returns:

      • updateCellStatus

        public java.lang.String updateCellStatus(int y,
                                         int x,
                                         Ship[] ships,
                                         Player mySelf)
        increases number of cells hit and prints message if a ship has been sunk
        Parameters:
        y - position of target, y coordinate
        x - position of target, x coordinate
        ships - array of ship objects
        mySelf - object for user
        Returns:
        returns null if no ships have been fully sunk

      • checkIfShipPresent

        public boolean checkIfShipPresent(int shotX,
                                  int shotY,
                                  int shipX,
                                  int shipY,
                                  int shipSize,
                                  int shipDirection)
        checks if ship is where target coordinate is
        Parameters:
        shotX - x position that user is firing at
        shotY - y position that user is firing at
        shipX - x position on grid
        shipY - y position on grid
        shipSize - size of ship
        shipDirection - direction of ship
        Returns:
        true or false depending on whether a ship is present at users coordinates

      • saveGame

        public void saveGame(Ship[] ships,
                     Player mySelf)
        Writes the values of the variables in every object to an external text file and then writes the coordinates of positions shot
        Parameters:
        ships - array of ship objects
        mySelf - object for user

      • loadGame

        public void loadGame()
        Reads a file and parses it into arrays which is assigned to the objects then the coordinates below are read in to figure out what positions have been hit

      • checkIfEndGame

        public void checkIfEndGame(Ship[] ships,
                           Player mySelf)
        increments the number of ships sunk variable if a new ship is sunk and if shipsSunk = 8 then game is over and asks user what they want to do
        Parameters:
        ships - array of ship objects
        mySelf - object for user
